Package com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui

Contains Swing related utility code that is shared among all the applications.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LookAndFeelChangedEventListener Event listener interface for look and feel events
 

Class Summary
CelestiaFileFilter FileFilter for PNG, JPG, JPEG and BMP files.
FormattedTextFieldVerifier Class to stop formatted text field losing focus when it contains an invalid value.
FTLFileFilter FileFilter for PNG, JPG, JPEG and BMP files.
HiddenTableModel A table model that can show or hide selected columns of the data.
HTMLFileFilter FileFilter for PNG, JPG, JPEG and BMP files.
JNLPFileChooser Attempt to encapsulate a file chooser (which doesn't work in JNLP) and hide the fact that we're not running as a normal app.
LookAndFeelChangedEvent Event object for look and feel changed events
LookAndFeelUtils Class that handles the look and feel settings, preference and notification
LookAndFeelWatcher Class that reacts to look and feel change events and gets a window to update its look and feel.
PNGFileFilter FileFilter for PNG, JPG, JPEG and BMP files.
TextFileFilter FileFilter for PNG, JPG, JPEG and BMP files.
XMLFileFilter FileFilter for XML files
ZipFileFilter FileFilter for PNG, JPG, JPEG and BMP files.
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui Description

Contains Swing related utility code that is shared among all the applications.
